about_the_game:
Poggers comes to Zaxterion: Space Frenzy! with this adorable and super fun DLC for all fans of Poggers right here on Steam!

This Poggers ship has its own stats, an armor level above the base starting ship, and while he doesn't have any special powers, being his adorable self flying around destroying rocks and evil forces in deep space is really the most important thing!

The best part of this special DLC is that you don't need to grind the Zaxterion gems inside the game to unlock this ship as you have to do with every other ship in the game!

The best part of this special DLC is that you don't need to grind the Zaxterion gems inside the game to unlock this ship as you have to do with every other ship in the game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB graphics card minimum
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Poggers comes to Zaxterion: Space Frenzy with golden fuzzy fur and his own unique hand drawn space ship! All of his spaceship specs are completely unique from all the other ships available in the game! Best of all, you don't need to grind the Zaxterion gems in the game to unlock this special ship!
